alert.note: Alert for Ellsworth (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 17 at 10:33PM CDT until May 18 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN MCPHERSON...NORTHERN RICE...SOUTHERN ELLSWORTH AND SOUTHEASTERN SALINE COUNTIES... At 1032 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Solomon to 7 miles southwest of Gypsum to near Marquette, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters have reported 60 mph in Ellsworth. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mcpherson, Lindsborg, Galva, Canton, Marquette, Little River, Holyrood, Assaria, Gypsum, Bushton, Geneseo, Lorraine, Windom, New Cambria, Falun, Frederick, Roxbury, Bridgeport, Kanopolis Lake and Kipp. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
